title: What is the best home theater under Rs. 10,000 in India? - Quora

You will easy enjoy wireless connectivity with bluetooth in this system. Sony delivers powerful sound with output power of 80 watts. The remote control resolution, free preventive options as long as it's simple-touch buttons enable you to play, switch to next track and pause easily. In this system, the options of compatible devices like androids/tablets/laptops etc. is present. Sony home theatre system is ever catalogued as the vastly trusted brand in the amusement sector. As per your budget you can buy this product with full reliability.
